title: POLL: Should QSS remove ultimates like Mordekaiser?
body:
My friend and I were literally flaming each other because of this question:

.

Should {{item:3140}}  remove ultimate abilities like Zed, Fiora, Camille, Trundle and Mordekaiser?

1: Yes, because abilities like that should have some counteplay.
2: No, because no item should ever cancel an entire ability.
